item.description:
Hey ya'll,

Happy New Year :-)

So, I've been with this organization called Horizon's For Homeless Children since 1998, they are a really great organization that helps homeless families in Massachusetts, and Cradles to Crayons helps them as well.

Horizons for Homeless Children is actively preparing for their Annual Spring Event and their Leadership Council Annual Meeting. To help make these events successful they are looking for assistance in sending out over 3,500 save the date cards for their Spring Event and 500 invitations to their Annual Meeting.

They need volunteers to help with labeling, stuffing, and stamping save the dates and invitations next Tuesday, January 15th, from 1:00pm-5:00pm at their Roxbury headquarters, located at 1705 Columbus Ave in Roxbury.

If you would like to help out please email or call: Scot Keay | email: skeay@horizonschildren.org | Phone: 617.553.5422

Please be sure to indicate what times you are available.

 

DIRECTIONS:

Take Orange line to "Jackson Square Station" (upon exiting the station head east on Center Street toward Columbus Avenue, 1705 is the first building you will see.) less than a 2 minute walk.

 

Thanks ya'll :-)

TeLisa

The Boston Volunteers
Big Enough to Deliver, Small Enough to Care
Learn more: www.BostonVolunteer.org

group.name: Boston Volunteers. Big enough 2 deliver, small enough 2 care

item.name: Help - Horizons for Homeless Children - stuff/send "Save The Date" invitations
